name: Ludum Dare 50 Project (Unfinished)
description: This was a game I was making for the Ludum Dare 50 game jam, but I never finished it in time for the deadline unfortunately. So I stopped working on it for another game but I felt weird just leaving it in the folder and collecting dust, so I thought I would upload it. Keep in mind it is unfinished and very buggy. So I hope you enjoy this very rough roguelike game.
